Overview.description-en: Wisej.NET provides a number of "editor" controls to allow the user to enter content into the application. Typically an editor control corresponds to an <input> element in the browser.

Features.description-en:
The TextBox control allows the user to enter unformatted text in an application.
Usually a TextBox control accepts a single line of text. You can use the Multiline property to allow the control to display and accept text on more than one line.
Features.description-de:
Das TextBox-Steuerelement ermöglicht dem Benutzer, unformatierten Text in eine Anwendung einzugeben.
Normalerweise akzeptiert ein TextBox-Steuerelement eine einzelne Textzeile. Sie können die Multiline-Eigenschaft verwenden, um zuzulassen, dass das Steuerelement Text in mehr als einer Zeile anzeigt und akzeptiert.
Features.description-it:
Il controllo Wisej.Web.TextBox consente all'utente di immettere testo non formattato in un'applicazione.
Di solito un controllo TextBox accetta una singola riga di testo. È possibile utilizzare la proprietà Multiline per consentire al controllo di visualizzare e accettare testo su più righe.
Features.description-es:
El control Wisej.Web.TextBox permite al usuario ingresar texto sin formato en una aplicación.
Por lo general, un control TextBox acepta una sola línea de texto. Puede utilizar la propiedad Multiline para permitir que el control muestre y acepte texto en más de una línea.

Auto Complete.description-en: The TextBox control supports the inline Label property. This allows an application to set a label in relation to a TextBox control without having to create an additional Label control.

Labels.description-en: The TextBox control supports the inline Label property. This allows an application to set a label in relation to a TextBox control without having to create an additional Label control.

Input Types.description-en: Input types can be used to specify the type of content that should be entered into the field. Some input types use native browser components to assist in editing.
Input Types.description-fr: Les types d’entrée peuvent être utilisés pour spécifier le type de contenu à entrer dans le champ. Certains types d’entrée utilisent des composants de navigateur natifs pour faciliter l’édition.

Features.description-en: The MaskedTextBox class is an enhanced TextBox control that supports a declarative syntax for accepting or rejecting user input.
Features.description-fr: La classe Wisej.Web.MaskedTextBox est un contrôle TextBox amélioré qui prend en charge une syntaxe déclarative permettant d’accepter ou de rejeter des entrées utilisateur.

Features.description-en: The ComboBox control displays a text box combined with a ListBox, which enables the user to select items from the list or enter a new value. Objects in the drop down list can be of any type, the list will show a string representation of each item.
Features.description-de: Das ComboBox-Steuerelement zeigt ein mit einer ListBox kombiniertes Textfeld an, das es dem Benutzer ermöglicht, Elemente aus der Liste auszuwählen oder einen neuen Wert einzugeben. Objekte in der Dropdown-Liste können jeden Typs sein. Die Liste zeigt eine Zeichenfolgendarstellung jedes Elements.
Features.description-it: Il controllo ComboBox visualizza una casella di testo combinata con un ListBox, che consente all'utente di selezionare elementi dall'elenco o di immettere un nuovo valore. Gli oggetti nell'elenco a discesa possono essere di qualsiasi tipo, l'elenco mostrerà una rappresentazione di stringa di ciascun elemento.

Auto Complete.description-en: Use the AutoCompleteMode property to create a ComboBox that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.

Labels.description-en: The ComboBox control supports the inline Label property. This allows an application to set a label in relation to a ComboBox control without having to create an additional Label control.

Simple Binding.description-en: You can use Wisej to display your data however you want. This demo demonstrates how you can present data with just a simple array.
Simple Binding.description-fr: Vous pouvez utiliser Wisej pour afficher vos propre donnée comme vous le souhaitez. Cette démonstration montre comment vous pouvez présenter votre donnée avec un simple tableau

Features.description-en: The ListBox control displays a list of strings or data-bound values, allowing the user to select one or multiple options.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôl ListBox affiche une liste des chaîne de charactéres ou bien des valeurs lié aux donnée, permettant à l’utilisateur de sélectionner une ou plusieurs options.

Features.description-en: The CheckedListBox is based upon the ListBox control but includes a checkbox on the left side of each list item.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.CheckedListBox est basé sur le contrôle ListBox mais inclut une case à cocher sur le côté gauche de chaque élément de liste.

Features.description-en: The TagTextBox control represents a data field that displays a list of selectable and removable tags. The control recognizes tags as the user types and adds in front of the editable field.
The TreeView displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a TreeNode.

Selection Modes.description-en: The TreeView displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a TreeNode.

Features.description-en: The DateTimePicker control is used to allow the user to select a date and time, and to display that date and time in the specified format. The DateTimePicker control makes it easy to work with dates and times because it handles a lot of the data validation automatically.

Labels.description-en: The DateTimePicker control supports the inline Label property. This allows an application to set a label in relation to a DateTimePicker control without having to create an additional Label control.

Features.description-en: The MonthCalendar is a control that enables the user to select a date using a visual monthly calendar display. All the selection events are automatically available to handle on the server.

The NumericUpDown control contains a single numeric value that can be incremented or decremented by clicking the up or down buttons of the control. The user can also enter in a value, unless the ReadOnly property is set to true.

Labels.description-en: The NumericUpDown control contains a single numeric value that can be incremented or decremented by clicking the up or down buttons of the control. The user can also enter in a value, unless the ReadOnly property is set to true.

Features.description-en: The DomainUpDown control displays a single string value that is selected from an Object collection by clicking the up or down buttons of the control.

Labels.description-en: The DomainUpDown control supports the inline Label property. This allows an application to set a label in relation to a DomainUpDown control without having to create an additional Label control.

Features.description-en: The Upload control allows users to select files from their local machine and upload them to the server. The files are available in the Uploaded event on the server as a HttpFileCollection.

Overview.description-en: Wisej.NET provides controls for media playback in the browser like the Video and Audio controls and simple controls for drawing.

Features.description-en: The Video control allows users to play media from a given video file. The playback control events are automatically available on the server.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.Video permet aux utilisateurs de lire des médias à partir d’un fichier vidéo donné.

Features.description-en: The Audio control allows users to play aduio from a given media file. The playback control events are automatically available on the server.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.Audio permet aux utilisateurs de lire des médias à partir d'un fichier audio donné.'

Features.description-en: The Line control enables you to draw lines on a form or container at design time or run time.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.Line vous permet de dessiner des lignes sur un form ou un conteneur au moment du design ou de l’exécution.

Features.description-en: The Shape control is used to create any kind of shape by modifying the various properties of the Shape control.

Overview.description-en: Wisej.NET provides controls that can be used to contain other controls. Child controls can be docked, anchored, and positioned in relation to the container control.

Features.description-en: The Accordion control represents a collapsible set of AccordionPanel panels for presenting information in a limited amount of space.
The Panel control represents a collapsible panel with an optional header that contains a group of controls.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.Panel représente un panneau réductible avec un en-tête facultatif qui contient un groupe de contrôles.

Features.description-en: The GroupBox control displays a frame around a group of controls with or without a caption. Use a GroupBox to logically group a collection of controls on a form. The GroupBox is a container control that can be used to define groups of controls.

The TabControl control contains tab pages, which are represented by TabPage objects that you add through the TabPages property. The order of tab pages in this collection reflects the order the tabs appear in the control.

Layout.description-en: The TabControl control contains tab pages, which are represented by TabPage objects that you add through the TabPages property. The order of tab pages in this collection reflects the order the tabs appear in the control.

Features.description-en: The SplitContainer control consists of a movable bar that divides a container's display area into two resizable panels.

The FlexLayoutPanel control can arrange its child controls using the layout engine specified in the LayoutStyle property. When the value is set to Default, the child controls are arranged using the default layout engine, using their location, dock style and anchor properties.
The FlowLayoutPanel control represents a panel that dynamically arranges its child controls.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.FlowLayoutPanel représente un panneau qui organise dynamiquement ses contrôles enfants.

Features.description-en: The FlowLayoutPanel control represents a panel that dynamically lays out its contents in a grid composed of rows and columns.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.TableLayoutPanel.dll représente un panneau qui présente dynamiquement son contenu dans une grille composée de lignes et de colonnes.

Features.description-en: The PDFViewer control is used to display pdf documents in the browser. There are multiple viewer types available to display the documents based on the type of browser used.
The IFramePanel control can be used to show embedded web pages. This example embeds http://demo.wisej.com/CodeProject.

Overview.description-en: Wisej.NET provides controls for implementing toolstrips, menus, and more. These controls are typically used to display a list of commands for a specified view or control.

Features.description-en: The MenuBar component represents a menu structure for containers. The menu is composed of MenuItem objects that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure. Each MenuItem can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items.
The ContextMenu component represents shortcut menus that can be displayed when the user clicks the right mouse button over a control or area of the form.
The ToolBar control is used on forms as a control bar that displays a row of drop-down menus and bitmapped buttons that activate commands.
Tool buttons can be placed to the left or right of the target control, be enabled or disabled, auto-hide when the control loses focus, be always hidden, toggled on or off, and have their own tooltip.
The StatusBar displays information to the user about the object being viewed, the object's components, or the object's operation.

The VScrollBar and Wisej.Web.HScrollBar controls implement the basic functionality of a scroll bar control. You can use this control to implement scrolling in containers that do not provide their own scroll bars such as a PictureBox or for user input of numeric data.

The TrackBar is a scrollable control similar to the ScrollBar control. You can configure ranges through which the value of the Value property of a track bar scrolls by setting the Minimum property to specify the lower end of the range and the Maximum property to specify the upper end of the range.

Overview.description-en: Extenders are components that add, and manage for, properties to other components.

Features.description-en: The ToolTip component represents a small rectangular pop-up window that displays a brief description of a control's purpose when the user rests the pointer on the control.
The HelpTip component represents a small rectangular pop-up window that displays a brief help text next to a control when it gets activated (focused).
The Animation component provides support for animating controls or windows using predefined animations definitions or custom animations in response to certain events.
The Rotation component adds rotation capabilities along the X,Y,Z axis to Wisej controls.
The ErrorProvider component provides a user interface for indicating that a control on a form has an error associated with it.

Overview.description-en: Wisej.NET provides controls for displaying data such as a Label for text, PictureBox for images, HtmlPanel for html content, and more.

Features.description-en: The Label control is typically used to provide descriptive text for a control. For example, you can use a Label to add descriptive text for a TextBox control to inform the user about the type of data expected in the control.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.Label est généralement utilisé pour fournir un texte descriptif pour un contrôle. Par exemple, vous pouvez utiliser une étiquette pour ajouter un texte descriptif pour un contrôle TextBox afin d'informer l'utilisateur du type de données attendu dans le contrôle.

Alignment.description-en: The Label control is typically used to provide descriptive text for a control. For example, you can use a Label to add descriptive text for a TextBox control to inform the user about the type of data expected in the control.
Alignment.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.Label est généralement utilisé pour fournir un texte descriptif pour un contrôle. Par exemple, vous pouvez utiliser une étiquette pour ajouter un texte descriptif pour un contrôle TextBox afin d'informer l'utilisateur du type de données attendu dans le contrôle.

Features.description-en: The HtmlPanel control can be used to embed full HTML documents within a Wisej application.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.HtmlPanel peut être utilisé pour intégrer des documents HTML dans une application Wisej.

Features.description-en: The LinkLabel control is similar to a Label control with the exception that it can display a hyperlink. Multiple hyperlinks can be specified in the text of the control. Each hyperlink can perform a different task within an application.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.LinkLabel est similaire à un contrôle Label, à l’exception du fait qu’il peut afficher un lien hypertexte. Plusieurs liens hypertexte peuvent être spécifiés dans le texte du contrôle. Chaque lien hypertexte peut effectuer une tâche différente au sein d’une application.

Features.description-en: The PictureBox is used to display graphics from a bitmap, metafile, icon, JPEG, GIF, or PNG file.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.PictureBox peut être utilisé pour afficher des graphiques à partir d'un fichier bitmap, metafile, icon, JPEG, GIF ou bien PNG

Overview.description-en: Wisej.NET provides multiple types of buttons for user input. The Button, SplitButton, CheckBox, and RadioButton can be used to accept user input.

Features.description-en: The Button control defines a clickable element on the screen. Inside a Button you can put text, images, or a combination of the two.
Features.description-fr: Le champ Wisej.Web.Button définit un élément cliquable à l'écran. À l'intérieur d'un bouton, vous pouvez mettre du texte, des images ou une combinaison des deux.

Features.description-en: Wisej.Web.SplitButton is a composite control with which the user can select a default value bound to a primary button, or select from a list of mutually exclusive values displayed in a drop-down list bound to a secondary button.
Features.description-fr: Wisej.Web.SplitButton est un contrôle composite avec lequel l'utilisateur peut sélectionner une valeur par défaut liée à un bouton principal, ou sélectionner dans une liste de valeurs mutuellement exclusives affichées dans une liste déroulante liée à un bouton secondaire.

Features.description-en: The CheckBox control gives the user an option, such as true/false or yes/no. The CheckBox control can display an image or text or both.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.CheckBox donne à l'utilisateur une option, telle que vrai/faux ou oui/non. Le contrôle CheckBox peut afficher une image ou du texte ou les deux.

Features.description-en: The RadioButton control enables the user to select a single option from a group of choices when paired with other RadioButton controls.
Features.description-fr: Le contrôle Wisej.Web.RadioButton permet à l'utilisateur de sélectionner une seule option parmi un groupe de choix lorsqu'il est associé à d'autres contrôles RadioButton.

Overview.description-en: Wisej.NET provides several kind of controls able to manage data in lists. The List controls handle single items in the data list while the Grid controls can handle multiple properties of each item in the list.

Features.description-en: The PropertyGrid provides a user interface for browsing the properties of an object. This demo uses data binding to push property changes from the PropertyGrid to the card. Scanning the QR code will trigger an update on this page with information about the scanning device.

The DataGridView control provides a customizable table for displaying data. The DataGridView class allows customization of cells, rows, columns, and borders through the use of properties such as DefaultCellStyle, ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle, CellBorderStyle, and GridColor.

Summary Rows.description-en: Summary rows display table information aggregated to a single row.

Features.description-en: The ListView is a control used to display a list of items through one of four predefined views.
The DataRepeater control functions as a scrollable container for controls that display repeated data, for example, rows in a database table.

Overview.description-en: Wisej.NET provides several types of notifications that can be displayed to users including custom modal dialogs.

Features.description-en: The MessageBox control displays a modal message box, also known as a dialog box, that can contain text, buttons, and symbols that inform and instruct the user.
The AlertBox Displays an alert box that can contain an icon and text that inform and instruct the user. Alert boxes are not modal and can disappear automatically.

The ProgressBar is used to visual indicate the progress of lengthy operations. This demo starts a background task on the server and updates the client with new progress. The state of the progress bars are restored on a page refresh.

Unlike the MessageBox and AlertBox, which are static classes, The Toast control is a component that you create and can hold on to in your application. You can reuse it and you can update the content while the Toast is visible.

Overview.description-en: Wisej.NET was designed to be extensible and open to all sorts of technologies from the start. Any existing JavaScript control can be wrapped to become a Wisej.NET C# or VB.NET control.

Features.description-en: The AceEditor control is an embeddable code editor written in JavaScript. It matches the features and performance of native editors such as Sublime, Vim and TextMate. Ace is maintained as the primary editor for Cloud9 IDE and is the successor of the Mozilla Skywriter (Bespin) project.

The Barcode control uses ZXing.Net to generate Barcodes on the server and render them on the client. Supports: UPC-A, EAN-8, EAN-13, Code 39, Code 128, ITF, Codabar, Plessey, MSI, QR Code, PDF-417, Aztec, Data Matrix.

Scanner.description-en: A component for extending the functionality of the Wisej Camera to include barcode detection.

Features.description-en: The BingWallpaper extender component enhances the Desktop control by adding Bing’s daily stunning wallpaper images. You can set the rotation interval, fade duration and number of images.
The ChatControl extension control enables users to integrate a Chat box component into their applications

The Bubbles extender component enhances all Wisej components by providing additional properties and a useful bubble notification functionality. Every widget can display a popup animated and themed bubble when a value changes.
The Camera control makes it possible to take pictures with the device's camera and upload them to the server.
The ChartJS extension component uses the excellent ChartJS widget to render amazing charts in real time.

Scatter.description-en: Scatter charts are based on basic line charts with the x axis changed to a linear axis. To use a scatter chart, data must be passed as objects containing X and Y properties.

Bar.description-en: A bar chart is a visual representation of data values as vertical bars. It can be used to display trend data or to compare multiple data sets side by side.

Line.description-en: A line chart is a visual representation of data points plotted on a line. It's frequently used to display trend data or to compare two data sets.

Radar.description-en: A radar chart is a visual representation of several data points and their fluctuation. They're frequently used to compare the points of two or more data sets.

Polar Area.description-en: Polar area charts are similar to pie charts, except that each segment has the same angle and the radius varies depending on the value. This sort of chart is frequently used when we wish to display comparison data in the same way that a pie chart does, but with the addition of a scale of values for context.

Pie.description-en: The most widely used charts are pie and doughnut charts. They're broken into segments, with each segment's arc indicating the proportionate value of each piece of data.

Doughnut.description-en: The most widely used charts are pie and doughnut charts. They're broken into segments, with each segment's arc indicating the proportionate value of each piece of data.

Bubble.description-en: A bubble chart is a type of graph that shows three dimensions of data at once. The first two dimensions, as well as the associated horizontal and vertical axes, determine the bubble's placement. The size of the individual bubbles represents the third dimension.

Features.description-en: The CKEditor control (formerly FCKeditor) is an open source WYSIWYG text editor designed to bring common word processor features directly to web pages, simplifying their content creation.
The CoolClock control renders amazing analog clocks as Real-Time widgets. Supports several skins, logarithmic scale, and several properties to configure the tick delay or hide the second’s hand.
The CountUp control uses the excellent CountUp.js widget that can be used to quickly create animations that display numerical data in a more interesting way.

The FullCalendar extension is an amazing full-size drag-n-drop event calendar. Supports multiple views, flexible events, custom styles, integrates with Google Calendars, and it’s completely integrated with Wisej.
The Wisej.Ext.Geolocation component represents an object able to programmatically obtain the position of the device.
The GoogleMaps extension lets you control Google Maps as a fully integrated server control. The control fires events back to the server and the server can affect any visual aspect of the map.

HeatMap.description-en: A heatmap is a visualization used to depict the intensity of data at geographical points. When the Heatmap Layer is enabled, a colored overlay will appear on top of the map. By default, areas of higher intensity will be colored red, and areas of lower intensity will appear green.

Tilt.description-en: With WebGL Overlay View you can add content to your maps using WebGL directly, or popular Graphics libraries like Three.js. WebGL Overlay View provides direct access to the same WebGL rendering context Google Maps Platform uses to render the vector basemap.

Geometry.description-en: The Maps JavaScript API geometry library provides utility functions for the computation of geometric data on the surface of the Earth.

Features.description-en: The Html2Canvas extension component uses the Html2Canvas library. This Wisej component can take a screenshot of a specific control or the entire browser and send the image back to the server.

The JustGage extension component uses the cool JustGage widget to render animated, nice and clean gauges. It is based on Raphaël library for vector drawing, so it’s completely resolution independent and self-adjusting.

The jQueryKnob.Knob control uses the amazing jQueryKnob widget to create a Wisej Real Time dial control that allows the user to rotate the dial to change its value or to type the value in the middle editor. The component allows you to set the value, range, line style, colors and more.
The jSequence control uses the jSequence widget to turn text into UML sequence diagram.
The NavigationBar is a responsive vertical navigation bar that displays an application header with logo, child items, and a user panel with gravatar and other user information.

The Wisej.Ext.Notification component adds desktop notifications to Wisej applications. With this component your web apps can pop notifications on the user’s desktop even when the browser is minimized.
The OfficeViewer extension control uses Microsoft’s Office 365 Live Viewers to show Word, Excel or PowerPoint documents embedded in a Wisej application. You can view a file or a stream.
The Pannellum extension component uses the Pannellum library. Pannellum is a lightweight, free, and open source panorama viewer for the web.

Auto Rotate.description-en: Once the panorama has been loaded, make it rotate automatically.

Cube Map.description-en: Show a panoramic of a cube map

Hot Spots.description-en: Hot spots can be used to display additional information on the panorama.

Multiresolution.description-en: You can display a high resolution panoramas with the Multiresolution feature

Features.description-en: The ProgressCircle control is entirely implemented on the server side as a derived class of Wisej.Web.Canvas. It draws on a HTML5 canvas element on the client directly from the server in real time. The component lets you set value, line style and thickness, fill color, font, etc.
The RibbonBar extension component is a command bar that organizes the features of an application into a series of tabs at the top of the application main page or window.
The Signature control allows signature inputs and exports.

The Speech extender component enhances all Wisej components by providing additional speech synthesis and recognition features that allow a component to speak it’s content – or any text provided in code – and to receive text coming from speech recognition.
The Tesseract extension provides a wrapper for Tesseract.JS, a JavaScript library for real-time character detection: https://tesseract.projectnaptha.com/.
The TinyEditor control is a simple JavaScript WYSIWYG editor that is both lightweight (8KB) and standalone from: https://github.com/jessegreathouse/TinyEditor.

The TinyMCE control (Tiny Moxiecode Content Editor) is a platform-independent, browser-based WYSIWYG editor control, written in JavaScript and released as open-source software under the LGPL by Ephox.
The TourPanel component can create a customized tour of an existing application highlighting specific targets and displaying HTML Text in steps.

Overview.description-en: Wisej.NET was designed to be extensible and open to all sorts of technologies from the start. Any existing JavaScript control can be wrapped to become a Wisej.NET C# or VB.NET control.

Features.description-en: Wisej Professional and Enterprise licenses include access to premium extensions. Control libraries from the following vendors have been wrapped in Wisej to provide developers a seamless integration of any type of control.

Wisej Professional and Enterprise licenses include access to premium extensions. Control libraries from the following vendors have been wrapped in Wisej to provide developers a seamless integration of any type of control.

Wisej Professional and Enterprise licenses include access to premium extensions. Control libraries from the following vendors have been wrapped in Wisej to provide developers a seamless integration of any type of control.

Wisej Professional and Enterprise licenses include access to premium extensions. Control libraries from the following vendors have been wrapped in Wisej to provide developers a seamless integration of any type of control.

Wisej Professional and Enterprise licenses include access to premium extensions. Control libraries from the following vendors have been wrapped in Wisej to provide developers a seamless integration of any type of control.

Wisej Professional and Enterprise licenses include access to premium extensions. Control libraries from the following vendors have been wrapped in Wisej to provide developers a seamless integration of any type of control.

Overview.description-en: Wisej.NET was designed to be extensible and open to all sorts of technologies from the start. Any existing JavaScript control can be wrapped to become a Wisej.NET C# or VB.NET control.

Features.description-en: Free, high quality, open source icon library with over 1,500 icons. Include them anyway you like—SVGs, SVG sprite, or web fonts. Use them with or without Bootstrap in any project.
The complete css.gg icon pack.
The complete Elegant Icons icon pack from Elegant Themes.
Feather is a collection of simply beautiful open source icons. Each icon is designed on a 24x24 grid with an emphasis on simplicity, consistency, and flexibility.
The complete set of 600+ icons in Font Awesome.
Premium designed icons for use in web, iOS, Android, and desktop apps.

Material design system icons are simple, modern, friendly, and sometimes quirky. Each icon is created using our design guidelines to depict in simple and minimal forms the universal concepts used commonly throughout a UI.
The complete set of ModernUI icons, featuring 1200+ icons for you to choose from.
Tabler icons are free and open source icons designed to make your website or app attractive, visually consistent and simply beautiful.
Vaadin Icons is a set of 600+ icons designed for web applications. Free to use, anywhere!
The Visual Studio Icon Library contains application 4600+ icons that appear in Microsoft Visual Studio, Microsoft Windows, the Office system and other Microsoft software.
